description: Easy Celery Black Pepper Tofu. Spicy, hot. Roasted crisp tofu, added to celery & black pepper sauce. How to make Black pepper Tofu. Vegan Gluten-free nut-free. Can be oil-free. serves 2 with rice.
name: Celery Black Pepper Tofu
recipeIngredient: 14 oz firm tofu (cubed (1.5 cups) - no need to press)
3 to 4 Tbsp cornstarch or other starch
2 dried red chilies chopped or broken into 2 pieces
1/4 cup chopped green bell pepper ( or onion)
1 tsp or more coarsely crushed black pepper (preferably ground/crushed with a mortar pestle)

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the Tofu and keep ready. Make a thick batter of soy sauce through cornstarch. (add a tsp more water if needed, but dont add too much as the tofu will add its own moisture when you mix it in). Immediately Add tofu and mix to coat. * If you leave the batter to sit, it will solidify in a few minutes and will need extra moisture to be batter again.

Let it marinate for 10 to 15 minutes. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F / 200oc. Place the tofu cubes on parchment lined baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes or longer. Or pan fry in oil until golden. Keep aside
